common.seoDescription: CarryOn lets travelers earn by delivering items along their route, and helps senders deliver faster and cheaper via trusted travelers.

hero.title: Connect Your Journey. Deliver a Smile.
hero.subtitle: Turn your travel into a rewarding delivery route. Your journey helps someone's day!

features.title: A Smarter Way to Travel and Send
features.subtitle: Discover the benefits of a community-powered delivery network.

earnOnTravel.title: Earn on Your Travels
earnOnTravel.description: Monetize your extra luggage space by carrying items for others along your existing travel routes.

sendWithTrust.title: Send with Trust
sendWithTrust.description: Get your items delivered quickly and affordably by a trusted network of peer-to-peer travelers.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly Delivery
ecoFriendly.description: Reduce carbon footprint by utilizing space in journeys already being made. Good for you, good for the planet.

loggedIn.postTripDesc: Share your travel plans and earn by delivering items

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Mosafer

q1.question: How does Mosafer work?
q1.answer: Mosafer connects travelers with extra luggage space to people who need to send items. Travelers can post their trips and earn money by delivering items, while senders can find reliable travelers going their way.

q2.question: Is it safe to send items with travelers?
q2.answer: Yes! We have a rating and review system where users can rate each other after transactions. This helps build trust in our community. We recommend checking traveler profiles and ratings before sending items.

q3.question: How much does it cost?
q3.answer: The cost varies based on the item weight and the traveler's pricing. Travelers set their price per kilogram, and you can negotiate through our messaging system. It's typically much cheaper than traditional courier services.

q4.question: What items can I send?
q4.answer: You can send most items, but please avoid prohibited items like dangerous goods, illegal substances, or perishable food. Always communicate with the traveler about what you're sending to ensure they're comfortable carrying it.

q5.question: How do I track my delivery?
q5.answer: You can communicate directly with the traveler through our in-app messaging system. They can update you on the delivery status, and you'll receive notifications when the item is marked as delivered.

q6.question: What if something goes wrong?
q6.answer: If there's an issue with your delivery, please contact us immediately through our support system. We have a dispute resolution process and will work to resolve any problems.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Mosafer aims to create a community-powered delivery network that benefits both travelers and senders. We believe in making travel more rewarding while providing affordable and fast delivery options.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading peer-to-peer delivery platform in Egypt, connecting communities and making travel more meaningful and profitable for everyone.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We build trust through our rating system and community verification.

community.title: Community
community.description: We're powered by our community of travelers and senders working together.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We promote eco-friendly delivery by utilizing existing travel routes.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make delivery services accessible and affordable for everyone.

step1.title: For Travelers
step1.description: Post your trip details, set your price per kilogram, and earn money by delivering items along your route.

step2.title: For Senders
step2.description: Create a delivery request, browse available trips, and send offers to travelers going your way.

step3.title: Connect & Deliver
step3.description: Communicate through our messaging system, agree on terms, and complete the delivery with our tracking system.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contactUs.description: Have a question, suggestion, or need help? Reach out to us through any of the following methods:

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

hours.title: Support Hours
hours.description: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EET

terms.title: Terms of Service

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using Mosafer, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

section2.title: 2. Description of Service
section2.content: Mosafer is a peer-to-peer delivery platform that connects travelers with extra luggage space to people who need to send items. We facilitate connections but are not responsible for the actual delivery or any disputes between users.

section3.title: 3. User Responsibilities
section3.content: Users are responsible for accurately describing items, ensuring safe delivery, and communicating honestly with other users. Prohibited items include dangerous goods, illegal substances, and perishable food items.

section4.title: 4. Payment and Fees
section4.content: Payment arrangements are made directly between travelers and senders. Mosafer does not handle payments or take commissions. Users are responsible for their own payment transactions.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.content: Mosafer acts as a platform connecting users and is not liable for any loss, damage, or injury resulting from the use of our service. Users participate at their own risk.

section6.title: 6. User Accounts
section6.content: Users must provide accurate information and maintain the security of their accounts. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

section7.title: 7. Modifications to Terms
section7.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

terms.contact: For questions about these terms, please contact us at amr.nabel3993@gmail.com

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information you provide directly, including name, email, phone number, and profile information. We also collect usage data and device information when you use our service.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, process transactions, and ensure platform safety. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content: We share your information only with other users as necessary for the service (e.g., showing your name in chat). We may share aggregated, anonymized data for analytics purposes.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of certain communications. Contact us to exercise these rights.

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
section6.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze usage, and personalize content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

privacy.contact: For privacy concerns, please contact us at amr.nabel3993@gmail.com
